italianFoods.name: Pizza Margherita
italianFoods.description: Classic Italian pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.

italianFoods.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
italianFoods.description: Spaghetti pasta with a rich meat-based Bolognese sauce.

italianFoods.name: Lasagna
italianFoods.description: Layered pasta dish with meat, cheese, and tomato sauce.

italianFoods.name: Ravioli
italianFoods.description: Pasta filled with meat, cheese, or vegetables, typically served in broth or with a sauce.

italianFoods.name: Tiramisu
italianFoods.description: Italian dessert consisting of layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

italianFoods.name: Caprese Salad
italianFoods.description: Simple Italian salad made with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, and olive oil.

italianFoods.name: Gnocchi
italianFoods.description: Soft dough dumplings made from potatoes, semolina, or flour.

italianFoods.name: Calzone
italianFoods.description: Folded pizza filled with ingredients such as ricotta, mozzarella, and tomato sauce.

italianFoods.name: Minestrone Soup
italianFoods.description: Vegetable soup with pasta or rice, often containing tomatoes, beans, and various vegetables.

italianFoods.name: Osso Buco
italianFoods.description: Milanese specialty of braised veal shanks in a flavorful broth.

italianFoods.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
italianFoods.description: Pasta noodles in a creamy sauce made with butter and Parmesan cheese.

italianFoods.name: Arancini
italianFoods.description: Deep-fried rice balls stuffed with meat, cheese, or vegetables.

italianFoods.name: Eggplant Parmesan
italianFoods.description: Sliced and breaded eggplant, layered with marinara sauce and cheese, then baked.

italianFoods.name: Bruschetta
italianFoods.description: Toasted bread topped with diced tomatoes, garlic, and basil.

italianFoods.name: Panna Cotta
italianFoods.description: Italian dessert made by simmering together cream, milk, and sugar, mixing with gelatin, and letting it cool until set.

italianFoods.name: Cannoli
italianFoods.description: Italian pastry dessert with a tube-shaped shell filled with a sweet, creamy filling containing ricotta.

italianFoods.name: Veal Marsala
italianFoods.description: Veal cutlets in a rich Marsala wine and mushroom sauce.

italianFoods.name: Amatriciana Pasta
italianFoods.description: Pasta dish featuring tomatoes, guanciale (or pancetta), Pecorino cheese, and sometimes onions or garlic.

italianFoods.name: Limoncello
italianFoods.description: Italian lemon-flavored liqueur, typically served as a digestif.

italianFoods.name: Cacio e Pepe
italianFoods.description: Simple Roman pasta dish featuring Pecorino Romano cheese and black pepper.
